item.title: Cron-Ease
item.description: A user interface for managing cron jobs

item.title: Viant Technology - Full Stack Intern
item.description: Responsibilities/Accomplishments As a Full Stack Intern in the Platform team I - Developed a feature for extracting audio from videos using `AWS MediaConvert`, `SNS`, `DynamoDB`, and `EventBridge`, increasing the bid eligibility for clientsâ€™ ad campaigns and thereby achieving a lift of `25%` in the generated revenue (projected) Added an upload functionality in the UI to automate the process of adding third-party segments to the database using `Angular`,`Golang`, `AWS Lambda`, `APIGateway`, and `S3`, saving `8+` engineer hours Contributed to the architecture for the Video-to-Audio Conversion project Leveraged Go Generics to make it easier to add/fetch objects from `DynamoDB` Highlights outside the realm of my role Improved performance of existing Python scripts by `30x` on average using Codon, reducing costs by at least `15x`
